name: unoflex
description: A Simple and lightweight flexbox boilerplate

scripts.build-prod: npm run clean-css && npm run build-dist && npm run docs-css
scripts.build-dist: rimraf dist/css && npm run dist-css-unoflex &&npm run dist-min-unoflex
scripts.dist-css-unoflex: node-sass -r src/scss/unoflex.scss -o dist/css/ && postcss -u autoprefixer -r dist/css/*
scripts.dist-min-unoflex: node-sass -r src/scss/unoflex.scss | cleancss -o dist/css/unoflex.min.css && postcss -u autoprefixer -r dist/css/*
scripts.docs-css: node-sass -r src/scss/ -o docs/css/ && postcss -u autoprefixer -r docs/css/*

author: Arthur Prather
